summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by setting the deployment/publish domain slug to "ip-look-up" in the HTML meta configuration. No other required changes are evident from the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated internal project tracking/state to add a new feature request entry and related metadata (not explicitly requested as part of REQ-1 implementation).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update the publish/deployment domain slug; it does not request changes to project_state.json bookkeeping.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified/expanded the generated frontend file summaries to describe many frontend components/hooks/styles unrelated to the slug change.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for documentation/summary updates or any frontend behavior/styling changes; only the slug configuration change is requested.
